common.title: Assessment: '__title__'
common.saving: Depending on the amount of data it may take up to 20 seconds before the next pair is selected.</br>Our sincere apologies for the inconvenience.

comparison_continue.description: Do you wish to continue comparisons for '__assessment__'?

comparison_unfinished.description: You have an incomplete comparison. Please complete it first.

notes.label: Notes
notes.tooltip: Write down whatever remarks you have about this representation.
